gameDetails.name: Seven Days Battles
gameDetails.description:
Includes four battles of the Civil War. Each game has its own scenarios, 2 color 34"x22" maps, and 100 counters for each battle (400 total counters). Basic, Advanced and Campaign Rules in 16 page rulebook. Has a high Solitaire Suitability Rating. Rules are based on the Blue & Gray system originally created by Jim Dunnigan of SPI.

Individual battles include:

    Seven Pines
    Frayser's Farm
    Gaines Mill
    Malvern Hill


The campaign rules allow players to combine all four battles into one longer conflict recreating the Seven Days.

Integrates with:

    Savage Station
